exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,over" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="81" height="27">
       
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected,over,overAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="28">
    <e:Image source="ui_json.soundNoNormal" x="0" source.down="ui_json.soundNoDown" source.over="ui_json.soundNoOver" source.upAndSelected="ui_json.soundNormal" source.downAndSelected="ui_json.soundDown" source.disabledAndSelected="ui_json.soundNormal" source.overAndSelected="ui_json.soundOver"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="vskins.playButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="50" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" height.down="40">
	<e:Image source="ui_json.mn1" source.down="ui_json.mn2"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BottomViewSkin" width="980" height="630" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="flag">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{flagLeft}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="300">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{90}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:Wait duration="50"/>
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{flagRight}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="300">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{-99}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:Wait duration="50"/>
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Image source="ui_json.btbg" y="552"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_json.nb" x="3" y="537" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_json.blue" x="354" y="536" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_json.blue2" x="557" y="564" locked="true"/>
	<e:Label text="期号" x="160" y="570" size="18" textColor="0x5bcfff" locked="true"/>
	<e:Label text="冠亚军和" x="426.5" y="570" size="18" textColor="0x5BCFFF" locked="true"/>
	<e:Label text="1-5龙虎" x="631.5" y="571" size="18" textColor="0x5BCFFF" locked="true"/>
	<e:Label id="day_txt" text="2017" x="58" y="597" size="18" textColor="0x5BCFFF"/>
	<e:Label id="up_txt" text="2017" x="239" y="597" size="18" textColor="0x5BCFFF"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_total" text="小" x="395.5" y="597" size="18" textColor="0x5BCFFF"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_bs" text="大" x="451" y="597" size="18" textColor="0x5BCFFF"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_ds" text="大" x="518" y="597" size="18" textColor="0x5BCFFF"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_lh_1" text="大" x="589" y="597" size="18" textColor="0x5BCFFF"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_lh_2" text="大" x="626.5" y="597" size="18" textColor="0x5BCFFF"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_lh_3" text="大" x="658.5" y="597" size="18" textColor="0x5BCFFF"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_lh_4" text="大" x="694.5" y="597" size="18" textColor="0x5BCFFF"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_lh_5" text="大" x="733.5" y="597" size="18" textColor="0x5BCFFF"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_json.mnbg" x="764" y="535" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="flagLeft" source="ui_json.flagL" x="885" y="612" anchorOffsetX="105" anchorOffsetY="50"/>
	<e:Image id="flagRight" source="ui_json.flagR" x="888" y="606" anchorOffsetX="27" anchorOffsetY="46"/>
	<e:Image id="cup" source="ui_json.icon" x="831" y="559"/>
	<e:Button id="tryBtn" label="Button" x="833" y="572" skinName="vskins.playButtonSkin"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ChartCarItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" width="90" height="100" states="up,down,upAndSelected,downAndSelected" >
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="animForward">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{car}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="250">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1.1}" scaleY="{1.1}" y="{60}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="animBack">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{car}">
			<tween:Set>
				<tween:props>
					<e:Object y="{60}" scaleX="{1.1}" scaleY="{1.1}"/>
				</tween:props>
			</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="250">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1}" scaleY="{1}" y="{43}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Image id="car" source="chart_json.car1_1" anchorOffsetX="40" anchorOffsetY="43" y="43" x="45" scaleX.up="1" scaleY.up="1"/>
	<e:Image id="border" source="chart_json.borderN" y="56" x.up="14" source.upAndSelected="chart_json.borderS" y.upAndSelected="52" x.upAndSelected="10" source.downAndSelected="chart_json.borderS" y.downAndSelected="52" x.downAndSelected="10" x.down="14"/>
	<e:Label id="rankLab" text="第三名" y="61" size="12" horizontalCenter="0" textColor.upAndSelected="0xffe400" textColor.downAndSelected="0xffe400"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ChartImgSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label text="车号" x="6" y="4" textColor="0x80BEFF" size="18" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label text="1" x="10" y="51" textColor="0x80BEFF" size="12" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label text="2" x="10" y="67.44444444444446" textColor="0x80BEFF" size="12" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label text="3" x="10" y="83.88888888888891" textColor="0x80BEFF" size="12" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label text="4" x="10" y="100.33333333333337" textColor="0x80BEFF" size="12" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label text="5" x="10" y="116.77777777777783" textColor="0x80BEFF" size="12" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label text="6" x="10" y="133.22222222222229" textColor="0x80BEFF" size="12" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label text="7" x="10" y="149.66666666666674" textColor="0x80BEFF" size="12" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label text="8" x="10" y="166.1111111111112" textColor="0x80BEFF" size="12" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label text="9" x="10" y="182.55555555555566" textColor="0x80BEFF" size="12" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label text="10" x="5" y="199" textColor="0x80BEFF" size="12" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_title" text="走势图" y="0" textColor="0x80BEFF" size="20" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" width="195" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="chartTextGrp" width="468" height="20" x="18" y="211" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
	<e:Group id="chartGrp" width="469" height="148" x="25" y="59" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0">
		<e:Group id="tip" width="79" height="45" x="269" y="51.79" anchorOffsetX="11" anchorOffsetY="33">
		<e:Image source="chart_json.tip" x="5" y="-1"/>
		<e:Label id="chartNumLab" text="车号：" x="10" y="3" size="14" textColor="0xFFDB2B"/>
		<e:Image source="chart_json.redPoint" x="7" y="28"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="vskins.CButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" height="20" width="76">
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay"
             size="15"
             verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" text="00" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0xa5aebb" textColor.disabled="0xa0dcff" textColor.down="0x3bb4f9" textColor.up="0xa0dcff" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="vskins.MusicToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected,over,overAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="TopViewSkin" width="980" height="630" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:game="game.*">
	<w:Config id="15d7c989757"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_json.topbg" x="0"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_json.logo" x="-40" y="0" locked="true"/>

		<e:Image id="num1" source="ui_json.num1" x="11" y="19"/>
		<e:Image id="num2" source="ui_json.num2" x="92" y="14"/>
		<e:Image id="num3" source="ui_json.num3" x="455" y="13"/>
		<e:Image id="num4" source="ui_json.num4" x="424" y="5"/>
		<e:Image id="num5" source="ui_json.num5" x="461" y="13"/>

		<e:Image id="num7" source="ui_json.num7" x="517" y="6"/>
		<e:Image id="num8" source="ui_json.num8" x="521" y="7"/>
		<e:Image id="num9" source="ui_json.num9" x="549" y="14"/>

	<game:MultySkinButton id="countBtn" label="Button" x="865" y="62" skinName="MultyButtonSkin" prefix="tj" scaleX="1.2" scaleY="1.2"/>
	<game:MultySkinButton id="backRaceBtn" label="Button" x="865" y="62" skinName="MultyButtonSkin" prefix="sd" scaleX="1.2" scaleY="1.2"/>
	<e:Group id="screenGrp" x="0" y="0" visible="false">

	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
